#summary Version 1.1.x, about mid February 2012
= Version 1.1.x  =

== Release date ==
About mid February 2012.
== Additional features ==
Allows programmers to set the type of components to customize and / or specific components (selected by name).
== Additional published properties ==
  # List of components types to customize. For example [TLabel, TEdit]
  # List of components name to customize

Items of those lists are selected from components already used in the form
== Additional published events ==
Nothing.
